1744D258490B03D8038DFCB3E5169D04: Define shared settings like tempo and key for all Patchwork devices. Only one Music Manager can be placed per island.
FBFF03364804673303F1AA8E8E8B092B: Define shared settings like tempo and key for all Patchwork devices. Only one Music Manager can be placed per island.
6CFD94D04ADAFBC4B058B48B9E8C0223: When enabled, playback begins from beat 0. When disabled, other devices can still be interacted with and modified, but their functionality will be limited.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Al: Determines if the Patchwork Tool can access any cable input or output ports on the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.En: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-game includes all phases prior to start of game (like the pre-game lobby or countdown to start of game.) This setting does not affect Edit Mode.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Au: Determines whether Patchwork audio takes priority over music from player Emotes.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Di: Disables the device when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.En: Enables the device when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Le: Please note: Use of a Patchwork audio device is limited to the creation of new and original musical works.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Ke: Sets the inputs for this device's Key carousel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Mo: Sets the inputs for this device's Mode carousel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Te: Sets the inputs for this device's Tempo knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Ti: Sets the inputs for this device's Time Signature Bottom carousel.
Sets the inputs for this device's Time Signature Top carousel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Ke: Sets the sequence of notes, or mode, that other devices will use to determine which notes are available.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Te: Sets the speed of the music in beats per minute.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Ke: Sets the tonal center, or key, that other devices will use to determine which notes are available.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Ti: The bottom value for the time signature. This sets the note length per beat.
The top value for the time signature. This sets the beats per measure.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.On: Triggers an event when the device is disabled.
Triggers an event when the device is enabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_ModularGlobalMusicController_C.Ja: When both Patchwork and a Jam are active, determines if their tempo, key, and mode are shared and where those settings are controlled.
